nodes.short_description: Um spin-off de VR do jogo de grande sucesso na versão plana, Medieval Dynasty, com um mapa novo, novas missões e mecânicas inovadoras de VR que elevam a experiência de jogo a novos patamares. Jogue sozinho ou junte-se a seus amigos e explore juntos o belo, mas severo mundo medieval no modo cooperativo.

VR spin-off popularnej gry komputerowej, Medieval Dynasty, zawierający zupełnie nową mapę, zadania i innowacyjną mechanikę VR, która przenosi rozgrywkę na nowy poziom! Graj w pojedynkę lub połącz siły ze znajomymi i wspólnie odkrywajcie piękny i niebezpieczny średniowieczny świat w trybie kooperacji.

nodes.file_name: IT 1. learn mechanics useful for survival.png

nodes.short_description: Uno spin-off VR del gioco di grande successo Medieval Dynasty, con una nuova mappa, nuove missioni e meccaniche VR innovative che rendono l'esperienza di gioco ancora più coinvolgente. Gioca da solo o unisciti ai tuoi amici ed esplora insieme a loro il bellissimo ma difficile mondo medievale nella modalità cooperativa.
大ヒットしたフラット版ゲーム「Medieval Dynasty」の VR スピンオフ作品。新しいマップ、新クエスト、革新的な VR メカニズムにより、ゲーム体験がさらに高次元へと進化した。ソロでプレイしたり、友達とチームを組んで協力プレイモードで美しくも過酷な中世の世界を探索しよう。ソロプレイヤーは 20 時間以上のアドベンチャーストーリーを楽しむことができる。

Ein VR-Spin-off des äußerst erfolgreichen Flachbildschirm-Spiels „Medieval Dynasty“ mit einer brandneuen Karte, Quests und innovativer VR-Mechanik, die das Spielerlebnis auf ein neues Level hebt! Spiele allein oder schließe dich mit Freunden zusammen und erkundet gemeinsam im Koop-Modus die schöne, aber raue Welt des Mittelalters.

¡Un spin-off en RV del exitoso juego de pantalla plana, Medieval Dynasty, con un mapa totalmente nuevo, misiones y mecánicas de RV innovadoras que llevan su experiencia de juego a un nuevo nivel! Juega en solitario o forma equipo con amigos y explora juntos el hermoso pero duro mundo medieval en el modo cooperativo.

Un spin-off VR du jeu à succès sur écran plat, Medieval Dynasty, avec une toute nouvelle carte, des quêtes et des mécanismes VR innovants qui élèvent l'expérience de jeu à un niveau supérieur ! Joue en solo ou fais équipe avec des amis et explorez ensemble le monde médiéval, beau mais rude, en mode Coopération.

A VR Spin-off of the highly successful flat version game, Medieval Dynasty, featuring a fresh map, new quests and innovative VR mechanics that elevate the gaming experience to new heights. Play solo or team up with friends and explore the beautiful but harsh medieval world in the Co-Op Mode together.
대성공을 거둔 플랫 버전 게임 'Medieval Dynasty'의 VR 버전으로, 새로운 지도, 새로운 의뢰, 혁신적인 VR 메커니즘을 통해 게임 경험을 새로운 차원으로 끌어올립니다. 혼자 플레이하거나 친구들과 팀을 이루어 협동 모드에서 아름답지만 혹독한 중세 세계를 함께 탐험하세요.

nodes.long_description:
Dive into the rich tapestry of medieval life with 'Medieval Dynasty New Settlement', an exhilarating VR game that seamlessly blends role-playing, simulation, and exploration. Set against the backdrop of a meticulously crafted medieval landscape, the player is tasked with the monumental challenge of founding and nurturing a thriving settlement and then starting their dynasty.
 
As the protagonist your primary focus will be on the challenges of survival, resource gathering, and the ambitious task of creating a lasting dynasty. Utilizing the immersive capabilities of VR technology, you will physically engage in the construction of buildings, cooking, hunting, and cultivating fertile fields. Doing all of this and much more will ensure experiencing the gratification of watching your settlement rise from humble beginnings to a majestic medieval hub.
 
Venture beyond the safety of your lands to explore the vast and enchanting landscapes, stumbling upon quests, challenges, and hidden treasures that add depth to the narrative. Encounter characters with unique personalities and stories, that will become a part of your settlement destiny

Notably, 'Medieval Dynasty New Settlement' stands as a VR spin-off of the highly successful flat version game, Medieval Dynasty, featuring a fresh map, new quests, and innovative VR mechanics that elevate the gaming experience to new heights.
nodes.short_description:
Embark on a fascinating journey with 'Medieval Dynasty New Settlement', a captivating game that brings players into a vibrant realm. Immerse yourself in the art of survival, construction, and dynasty-building as you strive to flourish in the face of daunting challenges. Dive into the richly woven tapestry of the medieval era and carve your path to success in this captivating odyssey. Experience the thrill of shaping the environment in this virtual reality sandbox adventure.
The dynasty awaits!
